column5: Off the beaten path, cozy studio-apartment-style beach condo a half a mile from the Gulf of Mexico. It can sleep six (a set of bunk beds in a tiny, converted walk-in closet, a double bed, and a pull out sofa bed) but is better for four people and optimal for a small family. It has a full kitchen, a washer/dryer, coffee maker, blender, toaster, central AC, Comcast cable, a dining room table with chairs, and a Nintendo Wii with Mario Kart and Smash Brothers.
column8: Off the beaten path, beach condo!
